coreAttributes.name: the black sword
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: Slash [npc2.name] with the the black sword.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] hold of the the black sword.
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(let)] go of the the black sword.

hitDescriptions.hitText: Thrusting the the black sword, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to jab [npc2.name] in the chest!

missDescriptions.missText: Thrusting the the black sword, [npc.name] [npc.verb(attempt)] to jab [npc2.name] in the chest, but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.herHim]!
Slashing at [npc2.Name], [npc2.she] [npc.verb(manage)] to avoid the hit.
Slamming down the sword, [npc.Name] [npc.verb(dodge)] the hit.
